import React from 'react' import { Nav, NavLink, Bars, NavMenu, NavBtn, NavBtnLink, Link } from './NavbarElements' import {useState} from 'react' import './Navbar.css'; import Dropdown from './Dropdown' function Navbar() { const [click, setClick] = useState(false) const [dropdown, setDropdown] = useState(false) const handleClick = () => setClick(!click) const closeMobileMenu = () => setClick(false) const onMouseEnter = () =>{ (window.innerWidth < 960 ? setDropdown(false) : setDropdown(true)) } const onMouseLeave = () =>{ (setDropdown(false)) } return ( <>
Logo
  • Home
  • Tile & Stone Services {dropdown && }
  • Contact Us
) } export default Navbar
